In the 2018 movie 'Race 3', what condition did Salman Khan have for being a part of the film?
Options:
A. He wanted to write the script himself.
B. He insisted that Remo D'Souza direct the film.
C. He required a different lead actor.
D. He demanded a change in the movie's title.
Correct Answer: He insisted that Remo D'Souza direct the film.

Question & Options:
In the 2018 movie 'Race 3', why did Saif Ali Khan decide not to participate in the film?
Options:
A. He was busy with other commitments.
B. He opposed the idea of playing a parallel lead to Salman.
C. He was not approached for the role.
D. He had a disagreement with the director.
Correct Answer: He opposed the idea of playing a parallel lead to Salman.
